prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a small rodent with bright colors and a playful demeanor.
Show me a bipedal creature with fluffy fur and big eyes, perfect for a forest setting.
Imagine a Normal-type Pokemon that has a unique ability to blend into its surroundings.
Generate a Pokemon that stands out with its vibrant color palette and quirky accessories.
Design a cute Pokemon that can be found in urban areas, always on the lookout for food.
Give me an adorable creature with a round body shape and a cheeky expression.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands, displaying a mix of brown and cream colors.
